title: Hextech chest glitch
body:
So, after I finish my last game. I got an S with lulu and a chest + a key fragment.
I went ahead and opened it, and after I clicked open and non of my loot appeared on the screen, so I waited for a good 1 minute and decided to click out of the tab. Then when I clicked back on my loot there was nothing. My chest and key were gone, so I am not sure if I got anything and I hope I can get some clarification about this.

Thank you.

replies.body:
Sometimes it can look like you didn't get anything from the chest when you get an icon from it. The icons are automatically redeemed and put into your icon list, so they never go into your loot. 

I saw that you got the Heartseeker icon (jealous ), so be sure to look through your icons for it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Rc4TIlL3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-10T23:53:10.416+0000)
>
> Sometimes it can look like you didn't get anything from the chest when you get an icon from it. The icons are automatically redeemed and put into your icon list, so they never go into your loot. 
> 
> I saw that you got the Heartseeker icon (jealous ), so be sure to look through your icons for it!

Oh, I didn't know they go straight to my icon list, and I will keep in mind about that.

thank you very much.
